activities: Operation of a car sharing service for members who join the service and all activities related thereto.  Personal data (online and off-line) is collected and received from members applying for, joining and using the service.  Zipcar, Inc. (“Zipcar”) is data importer of such information from its subsidiaries located in the EU and is a data processor and data controller of such information.  Zipcar also collects, transfers and uses data from our European-based operations, employees, agents and consultants in respect of employment activities, sales and activity and leads, customer service delivery and relationship management, general business activities and compliance activities.  Zipcar also collects and processes personal information through its web sites for general marketing and employment recruitment activities. Personal information may include, without limitation, personal details, family, lifestyle and social circumstances, employment details, education and training details, financial details, goods or services provided, offenses (including alleged offenses), driving pattern data and geographical location data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: TRUSTe EU/Swiss Safe Harbor Privacy Program
recoursemech:
TRUSTe dispute resolution for on-line customer data.  EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for human resources.
